text: Murugappa may refer to: * Murugappa family, Indian Nagarathar family * A. M. M. Murugappa Chettiar (1902-1965), Indian industrialist * Murugappa Polytechnic College, Avadi, Chennai, India * Subbiah Murugappa Vellayan, Indian industrialist * Murugappa Channaveerappa Modi (1916-2005), Indian ophthalmologist * Murugappa Group, Indian business conglomerate
title: Murugappa
